typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		capital_code as string,
		capital_desc as string,
		capital_account_number as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StaCapitalNumber
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 116 && SOURCE_SYSTEM == 'NT') ~> FilterCodeTypeIDandSourceSystem
FilterCodeTypeIDandSourceSystem, StaCapitalNumber join(TARGET_CODE == capital_code,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinStaCapitalNumber
JoinStaCapitalNumber derive(MAPPING_NAME = 'M_PRE_DIM_CAPITAL',
		LOAD_DATE = currentDate('CET')) ~> DerivedMappingNameAndLoadDate
DerivedMappingNameAndLoadDate select(mapColumn(
		PK_KEY = TARGET_CODE,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		CPT_NUMBER = capital_account_number,
		INSERTED_BY = MAPPING_NAME,
		LAST_UPDATED_BY = MAPPING_NAME,
		DATE_INSERTED = LOAD_DATE,
		DATE_LAST_UPDATED = LOAD_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectoUTPUTcOLUMNS
SelectoUTPUTcOLUMNS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_capital.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimCapital
